channel.title: Rotten Potato
channel.description:
Hey,
I currently use the rotten potato as a method for the admins to use, however I want to change the options.
I thought it would be located in Dialogue or OptionFive ect
http://prntscr.com/6fojje http://prntscr.com/6fokjc
I wanted to edit "Spawner" "Administrator" "Moderator"
So I found this, to change the text do I basically edit the "Spawner" "Admin" "Moderator" inside the commands folder? and rename it?

item.title: Rotten Potato
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

Hey on server side it will only change what each of those options do. to change the literal names of those options go into your itemdef or itemdef 2. and look for that items Id number and it will say something like (itemdef.Actions(0) “administrator”) and e.t.c and you just switch the name to what you want it to be inside those quotes.

Read full topic
